resources.string: 1. Choose the correct option related to Android. Correct answer:an operating system
2. Under which of the following Android is licensed?? Correct answer - Apache/MIT.
3. For which of the following Android is mainly developed? Correct answer - Mobile devices
4. Which of the following is the first mobile phone released that ran the Android OS? Correct answer - T - Mobile G1
5. Which of the following virtual machine is used by the Android operating system? Correct answer - Dalvik virtual machine
6. APK stands for ? Correct answer - Java
7. The full form of APK is Correct answer - Android Package Kit
8. What does API stand for? Correct answer - Application Programming Interface.
9. Which of the following converts Java byte code into Dalvik byte code? Correct answer - Dex compiler
10. How can we stop the services in android? Correct answer - By using the stopSelf() and stopService() method.
11. What is an activity in android? Correct answer - A single screen in an application with supporting java code.
12. How can we kill an activity in android? Correct answer - Both (a) and (b)
13. ADB stands for - Correct answer - Android debug bridge.
14. On which of the following, developers can test the application, during developing the android applications?? Correct answer - All of the above.
15. Activity in Android can be killed using? Correct answer - D) Activity in Android can be killed using both finishActivity (int requestCode) and finish() method.
